  • Field Details

    • content

      protected final java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> content

  • Constructor Details

    • Strongbox

      public Strongbox()
      Initialize content to the following HashMap: Coins : 0 Stones : 0 Servants : 0 Shields : 0

  • Method Details

    • getContent

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getContent()
      Getter method for content
      Returns:
      this.content

    • hasResource

      boolean hasResource​(Resource resourceToBeChecked, int amount)
      Parameters:
      resourceToBeChecked - resource whose amount we want to check
      amount - amount of resourceToBeChecked needed
      Returns:
      content.get(resourceToBeChecked) >= amount

    • useResource

      void useResource​(Resource resourceToBeUsed, int amount)
      Must be called after hasResource(resourceToBeUsed, amount) returns true
      Parameters:
      resourceToBeUsed - resource the player wants to consume from the storage
      amount - amount of resourceToBeUsed the player wants to consume

    • tryAdd

      public boolean tryAdd​(java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToBeAdded)
      Method that adds resources to strongbox
      Parameters:
      resourcesToBeAdded - Map of Resource -> Integer to be added to content
      Returns:
      true, because Strongbox's content has no constraints

    • addResource

      protected void addResource​(Resource resourceToBeAdded, int amount)
      Add an arbitrary amount of a single resource to content
      Parameters:
      resourceToBeAdded - resource to be added to content
      amount - amount of resource to be added to content
